website_summaries.verdict: Offering surprisingly decent sound for its small size, the JBL OnBeat Micro makes for a good little desktop or bedside speaker and charging station for iPhone 5 owners.
pros: The JBL OnBeat Micro is a compact speaker dock for Lightning-based iPhones and iPods
It delivers very good sound for its small size, and has a USB port for charging other mobile devices (and playing audio from them) and an auxiliary input for connecting to a PC
It also has a battery-powered option for mobile use
cons: You'll have to remove everything but the slimmest cases in order to dock your device
you only get about 5 hours of power from four AAA batteries
you can't play music from the docked device while a second one is charging via USB

customer_reviews.title: This is is a great sounding speaker dock
customer_reviews.text: This is is a great sounding speaker dock, especially considering its size. It's sound is not as full-bodied and powerful as the larger Mini, but it's size is convenient as a desk-top speaker and I also use it to charge the docked iphone. My iphone six plus fits nicely. Stereo separation is very good for such a small unit and it has sufficient bass output. It also runs off three AAA batteries and so is very portable but it charges the docked phone only when connected to an AC connection. It also has a USB port to enable external charging. The sound will fill a moderately sized bedroom or office without distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Michaelangelo

customer_reviews.title: Your stupid auto-standby mode made a baby cry tonight.
customer_reviews.text: We travel with this, and when we are home we keep it in a guest room. Our guests love it so much they keep trying to steal it. Great buy! -UPDATE We put this in our toddler daughter's room tonight and played her white noise / rain sounds. 10 minutes later she's sobbing in silence because somebody thought it was a good idea to program the dock to stay on ONLY when playing music. Fail. Really disappointing JBL, especially because this clearly happens to a lot of folks. JBL support is nonexistent on their website and it seems there might be a firmware update for it, but you wouldn't see that on their website anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: John Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Awful!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful speaker!! Only used this twice...it drained my phone battery and made my phone hot both times. .. I have an IPhone. The volume doesn’t even work, so when you’re listening to your music, you’re actually listening to your own phone volume. Apparently, I am past the return date (bought 2 months ago), so it will get e-wasted. Several years ago, I had purchased a larger JBL speak/charger and it was awesome...used it all the time. Guess I wore it out, as sadly, it stopped working and they don’t make it anymore. This little one is crap!
customer_reviews.author: CRVMommy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound; great versatility
customer_reviews.text: This dock has better sound than most stereo systems I've heard! And it can be moved around from room to room! Take it in the kitchen when you're cooking and Rock out! Take it in the bathroom while you soak in a warm bubble bath and chill out. Bring it in the family room and listen to your favorite tunes while you play Scrabble with your spouse. Keep it in the bedroom for romantic music and candlelight; or while you're getting ready for work, school, or a date night or a night out with friends. It's so versatile and the sound is AMAZING. You will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J. Rief

customer_reviews.title: The Best Little iPhone 6 Dock
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent iPhone 6 dock. It is compact, has great sound, and already has the appropriate connector for the iPhone 6 and 6 Plus. I have the former, and my husband has the latter, and we both use it. I was so impressed that I purchased two additional docks, so we have one in the kitchen, one in the office, and one in my classroom. The price is excellent, particularly since there is no need to buy an adaptor. I have had two phone cases, and neither of them allowed me to use the dock without removing the case, so I now have a case that easily detaches the bottom piece for ease of use when docking.
customer_reviews.author: She's Crafty

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Can't get any radio reception in my office, so am using this to listen to music on my iiphone while I'm working. It meets my needs perfectly. Great sound, small footprint so it doesn't take up much space on my desk, and I don't have to take the case off my phone. Since I've only just received it, I can't comment on its long-term durability at this point. My one complaint is that the Amazon description indicated it was a new item, but it very definitely had previously been removed from the box and not properly repackaged. Description should have said it was an open box item and price should have been discounted to reflect that.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Clear, clean sound, easy to use, reliable, pleasant design.
customer_reviews.text: very simple device, works, sounds great. This unit replaces a Phillips docking speaker which sounded horrible - all bass, muffled sounding. This unit sounds clear and well balanced. There are no controls to tune the sound quality on the unit itself but tweaking the equalizer on the iPhone changes the bass/trebble balance. The power of this small unit is decent and works great in a kitchen while hood range fans are on and water is running in the background. The unit features a standard USB input which is convenient because the phone case causes the docking to not fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Frost

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work with my ipod nano 7th gen
customer_reviews.text: I ended up having to return this item. After docking my ipod nano, I got the message: "Accessory not supported." I'm not sure if there was a problem with this particular unit, or if the newest iOS has a problem. JBL's tech support believed it needed a firmware update. Unfortunately, after multiple (6) attempts to talk with a tech support person that could help resolve this, I gave up and returned it. I own an earlier version of this device which I love and use all the time with my ipod touch. I wanted a new one to work with my devices that have a lightning connector. I am going to have to continue looking.
customer_reviews.author: TheTwinsMom

customer_reviews.title: I really like this speaker! (*with 1 small caveat)
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound from a compact unit! Has power "on" and "off "button, "volume adjuster" ,it feels well made and weighty enough to be stable, + also charges my I-phone. Only complaint is the lightning connector does not make good connection to I-phones with covers on , that many people do have on their phones. But I was able to buy a ' Male to Female Dock Extender Adapter Connector ' which extends connector just enough to work with my "Survivor" cover. (JBL should really include this with speaker.) Also I believe they have discontinued this model... too bad.. they could have improved it just by adding a 1/4 inch or so to the connector.
customer_reviews.author: Gallagher's Thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened to some of the reviews on this product...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, but after a couple of months, the device would no longer play music when running on battery power. Kind of disappointing because I liked using the battery feature if I was working in another part of my house because I could just unplug it and carry it to another room. I ended up putting this in my guest room, but opted to buy another speaker (UE Boom 2, 5 stars!) because of portability and sound quality. The lightning adapter feels flimsy too and requires that you are looking at it closely when you put the iPhone on the dock (i.e. you can't really do this if you're already laying down in bed without sitting up completely).
customer_reviews.author: James Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money as speaker and recharger - Versatile recharging capabilities
customer_reviews.text: Bought this - at less than half the price - to replace a Sony iPhone 5 clock and charger, which turned out to be a very disappointing product. Excellent purchase particularly at this price point since it was discontinued. Sound quality is good enough. Best thing about this JBL is the USB port that allows you to connect your device, recharge it, and play your music through it without having to take it out of the case if you don't feel like it. If you want something simple and small, but good enough power and sound to fill a room, this is the one you should get.
customer_reviews.author: Tape Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound quality great for ipods, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality and decent volume. Works great for use with iPods. Not so portable because requires an outlet but if plugging it in is not a problem a very nice compact speaker system.
customer_reviews.author: gbdusmc

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable how much sound comes out of this little pod!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second JBL dock I have bought and both sound incredible. This OnBeat is very small and will fill you entire room with quality stereo sound. It's loud, deep, powerful sound, and you'd never know it came from such a tiny dock you can set anywhere. Like many products it is set up to dock an Apple product but there's a 3.5mm port in the back so you can use virtually any electronic device. You can also run it on batteries or use the supplied AC adapter. And remember JBL is a Harman Kardon brand who is top tier in the game.
customer_reviews.author: JD Chatterton

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: This dock is a good deal for the price and does what it says it will do. It's a good choice for playing music at your desk when streaming is unavailable (as it is at my workplace). It charges my iphone 5s and puts out nice sound. The only really annoying feature of the system is that it does not remember volume settings; it starts playing at mid volume, which is very loud in an office setting. Really irritating, but not enough to return. My office mates are forgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Californica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nightstand companion!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little lightning stand and speaker setup. When I first got it I cranked it up and was properly impressed with the sound from this fairly small package. That said, my daily use (and reason I bought it) was just to have a phone charging stand by my bedside so I could plug in my phone each night and have ready access to it for the morning alarm, etc. While mine lives on my nightstand, it would work well in a kitchen, office desk, or anywhere you want some tunes with your phone. Great product that delivers as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great small speaker that charges your iPhone
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice small speaker that sounds great and charges your iPhone even while you're playing music or radio. I use this thing every day and it is well worth the money. I keep it on the corner of a counter top in my kitchen so I can listen to tunes while I'm cooking, so it's nice that it doesn't take up much room. The design gives much better sound that other small speakers I've had, although it would be nice if the bass tones were deeper. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact size and good sound.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to amplify my white noise maker I usually play through my phone. I'm very happy with this product. I am sure I ruined my speakers on my old phone by playing white noise through it for 8 hours a night for 2 years. I wanted to make sure I didn't do that to my beloved new iPhone. This device has great sound (much better than my phone speakers!), charges my phone and was well within my budget. Also, I like that it has a small footprint as I don't have a large night table.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Di

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome. No cases, but it works.
customer_reviews.text: So, my iPod Touch 5th Gen has become useless. I now have an iPhone 6 Plus 128gb and iPad Mini Retina 128gb. I just needed something to connect my iPod to for alarm clock. I do not need a case for my iPod Touch because I do not remove it. With that said, the lightning connector will not allow many cases. Be prepared to use this without a case on your device. But my iPhone 6 and 6 Plus fit on this and the sound is shockingly loud. I picked this one because it does not display the time. This is a perfect bedroom alarm clock or radio.
customer_reviews.author: #bergerlish

customer_reviews.title: Received non-functional and with missing components
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in damaged packaging, with rust on the battery connectors and a missing power supply, unable to power-up or function at all. Seller is pawning trash.
customer_reviews.author: CMcG

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive iPhone speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive iPhone speaker. Buy the extension adapter cable [ASIN:B00GP08858 Lightning Extension Cable (2 foot Black) for iPhone 6S, 6, Plus and 5/5S/5C; Pass Video, Data, Audio Through Male to Female 8-pin Cable. dockXtender for Lightning by CableJive.] so you don't have to perch your iPhone on this device, especially if you intend to use it around cats or children. I have one in the office and one at home.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound!
customer_reviews.text: This thing packs a PUNCH!!!! Bought it for a Father's Day gift and fell in love with it myself. Huge sound, tiny package. I've worked with music, producing and audio for 12 years and I can confidently say this little micro speaker is impressive. Cons: It runs through batteries pretty fast (who uses AAA batteries in 2014?! Come on). The way the iphone sits on the dock is a little strange, it almost faces downwards. I'd definitely recommend and I'll definitely be buying another, when I have the money.
customer_reviews.author: Happytoes

customer_reviews.title: My wife has a case that does that and while it looks like it is all the way in
customer_reviews.text: Small, no frills, but very powerful sound. They initially sent me one without the AC Adapter, so I had to return it. Cons: - Doesn't work with an iPhone in which the case goes all the way around the bottom of the phone. My wife has a case that does that and while it looks like it is all the way in, it doesn't charge. She has to take the case off. My iPhone has an open bottom and top (stops at the corners) and I can leave my case off.
customer_reviews.author: IndiansDJ

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great. Two problems: my phone won't sit down far enough to charge with most phone cases. It needs a lot of clearance on the sides of the charging port. I also wish it automatically turned on if you turn Pandora on. You have to turn the speaker power on every time.
customer_reviews.author: P-Town Mama

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound from a small package - and it charges your iPhone 6/5!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. I had a previous version of this unit and the sound was amazing for the size. I am using this with a new iPhone 6 and it works great. It fits in the holder perfectly. It charges while it is in the holder (contrary to the instructions that specifically says it does not charge the iPhone). Charged mine to 100% while I was listening it. Same for my iPhone 5s. It's a great little speaker for a small space. I use mine on my desk in my office and it's perfect for that. Buy it. You get your money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Walter J

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for a very specific purpose: to put on my desk at work in a small spot where i can see it all the time. it fits the bill - perfectly. sounds great, gets really loud so i can blast some metal when its after hours and im stuck doing paperwork. it has a very small footprint and fits perfecly right on my desk. and it was comparitively inexpensive. its hard to find a good value on a speaker dock with the lightning connector for iphone 5 but this product offers a lot of value for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: a7ropos

customer_reviews.title: Don't delay, act now...
customer_reviews.text: Do you want to listen to Mar Maron talk to you while you're naked? Do you want to sing along to nineties pop music while you wash your hair? Then you've found the perfect little speaker for your bathroom. This thing is a boss. Huge sound for such a little speaker. This morning I was able to sing at the top of my lungs to Smash Mouth's 'Walking on the Sun" and was still able to hear that horrible song. I was going to try Nickelback, but this speaker hasn't done anything to be punished for like that. So yeah. Buy this damn speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker, but.....
customer_reviews.text: Not much luck using this with my iPod. Ordered 2 units. Both produce a buzzing noise on some songs, one speaker was much worse than the other, the static was present on almost every song. Surprisingly, both worked fine with iPhone playback, no issues. Have excellent sound, super bass performance. Have not tried them with any other device.
customer_reviews.author: Gizzymo

customer_reviews.title: Not a nightstand alarm dock
customer_reviews.text: Bought this little guy to serve as a nightstand charging base, which it does, but guess what? it'll turn off your speakers so if you use your phone as your alarm, the alarm will go off, but it'll be silent. Turning the speakers off is a "feature" and you can't do anything about it. But if you just want a speaker dock to play music, i suppose its fine.... just beware that it's not a nightstand alarm dock. However, sound is good, crisp, and clear, and should fill a room easily.
customer_reviews.author: Oskee2001

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker for IPhone 6
customer_reviews.text: I had like six speaker docks before, one of them also JBL but for my IPhone 4 (that one was $80), but this one is the best of them. Is small, sounds great, and the price is unbelievable. Most importantly and that people have not really cleared before, it works perfectly with my iPhone 6 (don't know about the iPhone 6Plus though). However, you have to take the phone out of whatever case you have, because if not the plug is not going to connect with the phone. Otherwise perfect... Hey, I spend 28 bucks in 2 drinks sometimes; better buy the dock and enjoy the music with some wine at home :))
customer_reviews.author: PTYdude

customer_reviews.title: I have this in my bathroom and its so loud I can no longer hear how bad my singing really is
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. I have this in my bathroom and its so loud I can no longer hear how bad my singing really is. If I only sing with this thing on while in the shower, I might just have to go try out for American Idol! Its has crystal clear sound, but it does seam to be a little toned to where the singers stand out more. You can still here every sound clearly tho. Oh and it was less then $30...
customer_reviews.author: HMFIC

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted..mostly
customer_reviews.text: This little docking station is almost perfect for me - small, changes my iPod Touch when it's plugged in, portable, good sound...my only complaint is that I do move it around and run it on batteries quite a lot so I go through them like crazy. My old one for my old 30-pin iPod was itself rechargeable so I never had to worry about replacing batteries. Doesn't seem to be a lot of options yet in for the Lightening connector types. Overall I like it, but be prepared to go through batteries unless you leave i plugged in all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Micro dock packs responsive, quality bark.
customer_reviews.text: Good price. If you want to pump up the volume and saturate a medium room with deep and intimidating bass, this Micro Dock isn't the correct tool (and it shouldn't be!). That said, this little guy has great sound and a good spectrum. From rock to classical and some prog metal thrown in for good measure, the Micro is responsive and clean. If you need your neighbors to hear your tunes, buy this humble guy's bigger brother.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the size
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the size, works fine with iPhone 6 Plus with Apple leather case. Very good price - cost the same or less than a good dock for the iPhone, and you get a speaker as a bonus. I was looking for an iPhone dock,most of them sell for 30-50$ without a lightning cable ,than came across this speaker, can't beat the price. For 30$ you get a charger dock with a very good portable speaker. Wish it had a Bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: Shmuel Tal

customer_reviews.title: Versatile with reasonable sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little device with fast charging and good to very good sound. I don't have any cases that will fit with the unit, so I just remove the case when I want to use it. To me, that's not a big deal. I have it on my nightstand, and charge overnight, with the alarm set, and play some soothing sleep music or meditation. Works great for me, but I am not trying to fill a large room with concert hall sound.
customer_reviews.author: gizmodoc

customer_reviews.title: Will not work with case on phone
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but BEWARE that your iphone 5 or 6 will not fit on the 8 pin if you have any kind of case on your phone. Even the slimmest gel cases will not sit on the 8 pin snug enough for connection. You have to take phone out of case every time you want to play. Sent mine back. Refund handled promptly. No problems
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Total Dud
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased (and loved) JBL iPhone/iPod speakers before - but this (discontinued by manufacturer?) contraption is a total dud. After playing a few songs, the speaker become fuzzy and distorted until I pull the iPod nano out from the dock and re-insert it. Beyond annoying - the marker of an inferior and worthless product.
customer_reviews.author: Herkma

customer_reviews.title: Value! Value!
customer_reviews.text: Though I have an iPhone4 and the dock is designed for the later version, using the accompanying USB cable I am able connect to the speaker without issue. And yes, in addition to room-filling sound the iPhone4 charges while connected. I have given this speaker to my three adult children this Christmas and each uses it with enthusiasm. The speakers' compact size allows it to "disappear" on a desk or bookcase, and it's my go-to music source (Pandora subscription or i heart) for listening every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

customer_reviews.title: Great small speaker dock for various iPhones
customer_reviews.text: Nice small speaker dock for iPhone 5S or anything with the "lightning" connector, I think they call it. I think that includes the iPhone 5, 5S, 5C, 6, 6 Plus, 6S, and 6S Plus. But you should check on that yourself before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bulie

customer_reviews.title: I just tried it out and the sound quality is actually pretty great! And it can get REALLY loud
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a relatively inexpensive little speaker dock for my studio so I would be less tempted to play with my phone every 10 minutes while trying to work. I just tried it out and the sound quality is actually pretty great! And it can get REALLY loud! Much louder than I need for everyday use, but it's nice to have the option.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Carr

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Speaker Dock for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is very good speaker dock for the price. We listened to several speaker docks in the $100 to $150 price range at electronic stores and we believe that this one has a better sound. My wife loves this one because it is simple to use and does not have a heavy bass sound. I prefer more bass like that with the more expensive Boise speaker dock ($249) but I bought this one for her, made her happy, and saved a bundle of money. She also liked the small size of this one. So far it has worked great and I definitely would consider other JBL products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ben R.

customer_reviews.title: If have case on phone, don't get!
customer_reviews.text: Have a friend that has this and it works great...EXCEPT, you have to take off the protective case on your phone for this to fit right...who wants to do that? So I don't use it for phone charging but speaker was great!
customer_reviews.author: kcbookworm

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dock for my office so I don't expect to turn it up too high. If I needed it for anything requiring high volume I would send it back as the quality is not great. And, as other reviewers have pointed out the plug is HUGE. Ridiculously so. This product will serve the purpose but if there was more selection for iPhone 5s (lightning connector compatible) I would probably not have bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mairead

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, I've purchased JBL product for years
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, I've purchased JBL product for years. It works great, wish it came with a LCD clock. My only problem was that I had to remove my iphone 6 case everytime I charged the phone. So otter box cases or anything with the same thickness and you'll have the same problem. I ended up purchasing a slim crystal case that protects only the back of iphone 6 in order for it to fit into speaker without removing case.
customer_reviews.author: a.syed

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite purchases. I absolutely love this little speaker. It has great sound quality. I like that it is portable. I am a teacher and use it a lot in my classroom for music and motion. It is small and I can just pack it up at the end of the day. My daughter liked it so much she asked for one for last Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: D. DuBord

customer_reviews.title: THE perfect gift for sound enthusiasts or friends of them. SO GOOD THIS IS!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's Harmon come on. Must have for sound enthusiasts !!!!! Not super bass, but regular basis,kids and highs are Crystal clear. Any kind music.jazz,classical,rock,folk,metal anything. Just simply amazing. Sure cheap get it. Case of to fit who freaking cares. Just get the mini cord for the headphone jack if your that lazy. By them now as they are discontinued for some reason GET ONE,TWO,THREE.
customer_reviews.author: RaidaRey

customer_reviews.title: Good product but beware of certain phone cases
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars, but certain phone cases prevent an iPhone 5/6 from completely plugging into the speaker dock. One must first remove the case from the phone. I caution potential buyers to delay buying a case until after buying this product. Otherwise, the sound is good and the device charges the phone quickly. It has 'mass' to it and stays put on a table or shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound and nice deep bass
customer_reviews.text: Quality sound and nice deep bass. The size is hard to tell from the photo but it's a bit larger then my hand (adult man). Materials are quality. Everything surrounding the speaker is steel so the speaker is well protected. Only thing I don't like is its fiddley to get the phone seated. Although that's more on apple and the tiny connection. As well, i have to remove my case to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: nice compact unit
customer_reviews.text: This dock is a nice size for a small space. The cord is short so it has to be within about 4ft. of an outlet, so placement on a bookcase or other shelving might be tricky. Also, the plug on the adapter is bigger than I expected and rather cumbersome compared to my old dock. All in all, for a speaker dock priced under $45 you can't beat the sound or the quality.
customer_reviews.author: ren31

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound!
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker has great sound. I have a small TV in my garage that I have plugged into it with the 3.5mm stereo cable and it sounds great! In addition, I use it with my iPhone when I want to hear music. I like this kind especially because it is small and compact, has good sound but also charges the phone while it is plugged into it. It's perfect if you're looking for a basic speaker with big sound.
customer_reviews.author: TexasGirl

customer_reviews.title: What a deal
customer_reviews.text: Considering the apple lightning adapter alone costs $29 this is a steal. For the price you can't beat this thing. Sound is fine at lower volumes (I use it in my office) and it has every input option you could want...and the best part is you can dock and charge your phone without using an adapter - because let's be honest who still has a 4S or older anymore?? Remote would be nice, but at this price point I understand why its not included.
customer_reviews.author: Real Good Cycles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ipod nano
customer_reviews.text: I love this small jbl speaker. I transferred all of our CDs to an iPod nano recently and chose this little speaker to be able to listen to the songs. Small, basic and easy to use. Good sound, doesn't take up much room on my kitchen counter. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kearney Momma

customer_reviews.title: Overall it is a nice product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I thought of returning the speaker when my iPhone 6 with a slim case would not fit; however, I changed my mind immediately after I played songs on it. The sound is so powerful for a small unit, and it is well worth the price. There is a USB port that let you charge another product at the same time, but the music stops playing when I try to have two devices charging together. Overall it is a nice product for the price, that's if you don't get tired taking off your protective case every time you want to charge the phone or listen to music.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This speaker dock is great. The only caveat is that you need a phone case (if you use one at all) with an open bottom, otherwise it won't dock properly. Other than that, I'm very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: JenB.

customer_reviews.title: Fast charging, great quality sound in a very compact package.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife so that she could charge her iPhone and listen to the radio or music while at work. She loves it. It charges the iPhone very quickly, and the quality of the sound is great. Very compact, sits on her desk without taking up hardly any room.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: On par with Bose!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our infant daughter's room for lullaby music. A small package that produces high quality sound and sure can produce a lot of it! An audiophile could probably parse it out a bit more but I put the sound quality right around that of the different Bose items we have I out home. I would (and may) buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: JAA

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely live the micro speaker. I can plug ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely live the micro speaker. I can plug my songs in & clean with my music playing. What got me to get it is that my husband has one & I lived it, but that was my husbands, so I just had to get my own. Thank you do so much for his fact you sent ITV& thank you for your service in this. Have a very blessed day. Sincerely, Carolyn
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: This little thing works better than my wife expected
customer_reviews.text: This little thing works better than my wife expected. She saw the size of it and didn't think that it would sound as good as it does or even have any real volume to it. Well it does have a lot of volume and sounds real good for it's size. She uses it about every day and couldn't be happier. She even thanked me for the research I did to find something like this for her and said this was a good find.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Tomaszewski

customer_reviews.title: Love these charging station/boom box!
customer_reviews.text: Love this docking station since it works so well as a boom box but charges my phone up so quickly! This is the second one I've purchased since I've been so pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: didn't work with otterbox case on phone
customer_reviews.text: didn't work with an iPhone in a case, so its not like you're gonna peel off the 2-part otterbox case every time you dock it, is it?
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Myers

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for the iPhone 5 or 6.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the office, bedroom or bush Alaska! It charges your iPhone and plays your music. If you blast your music, it has additional connections in back for additional speakers/hookups. See manufactures info for the 2 type of hookups.
customer_reviews.author: daBilbo

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this thing
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! The size and sound that comes from the speaker was surprising! I use it to charge my Iphone5S and my mom's Iphone6 and it charges pretty quick. It also as a 2.0 USB port in the back which is nice since alot of my other devices charge via USB. The price point and reviews is what made me buy this charging dock, glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: quickdraw90

customer_reviews.title: Great item for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Puts out great sound. I bought this because I upgraded my iPhone to the 5S. I used to use the JBL On Stage version for my iPhone 4 and I loved it. This has just as great sound quality and bass is nice. Clear, not crackly. Only problem is I can't use it with my Speck case. I have to take it out of the case or get a case that folds back or it won't make the connection.
customer_reviews.author: bugg

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great at work
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great at work! Small speak but big sound. On occasion some of my coworkers will play those internet radio from their computers...if I'm not happy with the station, I bery easily drown out that BS with whatever I feel like hearing. Charges my iPhone 6 just fine even though my speaker was made prior to the newer phone.
customer_reviews.author: MrMike

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my iPhone 5S
customer_reviews.text: very nice deep and rich sound. The compact size makes it ideal for the nightstand next to my bed. You do have to push the little button to make the sound come out of the speakers after you plug your iPhone . I do not keep a case on my iPhone, however this dock looks like it was designed to work well with phones it had cases on them.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Dales

customer_reviews.title: I have the same problem as others with having to remove it - great sound, though
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived ahead of schedule and well-packaged; functions just as advertised - was hoping that my very thin iPhone case would allow it to dock without removing it. Unfortunately, I have the same problem as others with having to remove it - great sound, though.
customer_reviews.author: James Mueller

customer_reviews.title: I really want to love this.
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this.. The sounds is great! But for some reason, it turns off by outsell after a few minutes. I use it on my bed side to play relaxing music from the Sleep Genius app, but it always turns off before I fall asleep... Now sure if there is a trick to make it stay on and don't turn off by itself...
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for another speaker Dock for my new iPod. I loved the one that I had, it w the same model. I was so happy when I found the exact model and on sale. The sound is really great. The size is compact enough to take many place. I use mine at home, in the office, and at my barn. Terrific bass and all around sons
customer_reviews.author: Crystal's Horse Gal

customer_reviews.title: The features on it are cool and work very well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and it works very well. She has it by her bedside so she doesn't have to fuss with cords, etc...each night and wakes up to a fully charged phone. The features on it are cool and work very well. Also, the sound for this little device is really nice; quality product from JBL.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Danite

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality! I'm not a professional, but I enjoy listening to the music from my phone while I'm cooking or have guests over. This is compact, easy to dock onto and really has good sound. The little docking pin moves back and forth, so docking is easier than other models I've had. Very pleased with the quality, especially at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schnitzius

customer_reviews.title: Speaker stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This has turned into a giant iphone charger. While it still charges my phone, the speaker stopped working within a few months. Unfortunately the company's return window had already closed so now I'm stuck with it. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: FishyMcFish

customer_reviews.title: OK for the money...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses her phone to blue tooth to a sound box like this all the time. We got her this one for XMAS, but she said it was just OK; not great. We sent it back and got a more expensive one; the JBL on-beat Venue LT which was twice as expensive and 5 times better sounding. She loves that one and if you can afford it, it's the bomb.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Product gets stuck every 10 mins.
customer_reviews.text: It is getting stuck for every 10 mins. My iPhone continues to run but there is no audio in my JBL OnBeat. Tried with different songs and devices, yet issue persists. I have to physically disconnect iPhone with the JBL and reconnect to resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: RAJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great but make sure there is no case at all on your phone!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound! I really like the sound on this thing but the only downside is you litterally can't have any kind of cover on your phone or it will not connect at all. I thought mine didn't work at first because I only had a small silicon sleeve on my phone. I guess if they had made the connector a little taller that would have made it better.
customer_reviews.author: Paige C.

customer_reviews.title: Not What I was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was hoping for. I was looking for something to replace my JBL "On Stage II" from 2006. Not loud enough, not great sound. The only time I use it now is when I go on a road trip and have to stay away from home.
customer_reviews.author: robomacman

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good and the item is as advertised. I had read the comments that the iPhone would not work with a case, and I did find that to be true. However, I am uncertain why the lightning connector on the speaker moves. Perhaps this was meant to make it easier to mount the phone, but I find it to be the opposite.
customer_reviews.author: chemprof

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and does its job!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that would make this better is if it had batteries.... other than that is is great. Not all phone covers fit on it but it isn't anything an excite knife can't fix. The sound is good and it charges our phone very well.
customer_reviews.author: james kelly

customer_reviews.title: she travels a lot so I wanted to find a good quality speaker that she could use with her iPhone ...
customer_reviews.text: My friend had no music in her home at all AND...she travels a lot so I wanted to find a good quality speaker that she could use with her iPhone and iPod and also that she could take on her travels with her. I was definitely impressed with the clarity and volume from such tiny speaker. She is thrilled and so am I.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Sherri Carson

customer_reviews.title: Dock is nice and sounds great but won't work with a case
customer_reviews.text: Dock is nice and sounds great but won't work with a case. I wish someone would create an adjustable ligtning pin for these things and add some sort of supporting plastic other than the pin because it's bound to snap off at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lennon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a sound snob... Only buy speakers with quality sound. Bought this one for work, AMAZING SOUND and charged my phone, clear deep tones... Not quite Bose, but for the price, you can't beat it! May but a second one!!!
customer_reviews.author: sweet thing

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy packs quite a sound wallop! I needed something for my office (I'm the only one here most of the time and the silence was killing me), and I bought this on Prime Day. When I got it, I immediately hooked it up to my iPod Nano. When I turned it on and hit "play," the music came through loud and crisp. It's exactly what I was looking for for my office space!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis_Rueal

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter and it has great sound! JBL is a good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and it has great sound! JBL is a good product, I have sound system in my vehicle and it rocks. My only issue would be that it does not have a remote or timer on it. but you cant have all that unless you pay lots of money for those features, right? Recommend this to all.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Wife liked it so much we bought another one for her
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our preteen daughters birthday. Wife liked it so much we bought another one for her. Good sound, good price, perfect size for a nightstand to have your ipod always nearby and charging
customer_reviews.author: D. Damato

customer_reviews.title: JBL OnBeat Micro Speaker Dock with Lightning Connector (Black)
customer_reviews.text: Use it at work with an adapter to keep my Lightning case on. USB port for charging another device while docking and charging my i5s. Problem; no adapter to date lasts more than a few weeks on good behavior. I would buy it again except for that. Moving onto Bluetooth wireless speaker w/USB charging port.
customer_reviews.author: dwest69

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much everything I needed
customer_reviews.text: Sound is much better than I expected with this little guy. The bass especially is impressive. My main complaints (why I gave it a 4 instead of 5) was that I have to remove my case each time I put it into the connector (I knew that already from previous reviews but it still is a pain) and that the plug to the outlet has an additional little adapter that you have to connect. If you lose that, you are S.O.L... But overall, happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: This Guy

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Sound is amazing and I'm super glad I have it. It's capable of charging my iphone while on the dock AND at the same time my ipad through a lightning/usb cord from the back.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Galaso

customer_reviews.title: The quality you'd expect from JBL
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandmother's iPod. She took quick fast how to set it up and complimented the quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: and the ability to play on battery power only is a very nice touch. It's not incredibly loud
customer_reviews.text: Suprisingly decent sound for the size and price, and the ability to play on battery power only is a very nice touch. It's not incredibly loud, but the sound is pretty well balanced. Good for a small room or for travel/camping. Standard mini-audio in is also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew MartinTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great for work!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a speaker dock for my desk at work. This model works great! Sounds great on low, moderate, or high volumes. I also like that it charges my phone. Very happy with this purchase! Hopefully Apple doesn't change their lightning dock connector anytime soon!
customer_reviews.author: Nick P.

customer_reviews.title: nice but has auto standby feature i dont like
customer_reviews.text: my primary reason for getting this product was to use it as a base for an ipod touch i am using as a baby monitor. it works well and has a good sound but i dont like that it has an auto-standby that turns the speaker off after 10 minutes of silence. the manual says that it is to comply a regulation but it would be nice if there was a switch that would turn this feature off.
customer_reviews.author: Branden J. Horiuchi

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this product, especially for the price. I was looking for a docking station to use next to my bed and this fits the bill. The compact size is awesome and I was pleasantly surprised with the sound from the speakers it's quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Fanannie

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and is still small.
customer_reviews.text: I like it so much I got another. Came two day shipping on prime and sounds great . I have a few types of docks and this is by far the best sounding one. Oh and it sounds way better at less the half what I paid for some of my other docks.
customer_reviews.author: teddy p

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dock and sound is very loud and great bass! The only issue is the mount is a bit flimsy and naturally falls forward. Other than that it was worth it and plays great. The sound exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K7FLA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sound and Easy To Travel With It
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite speakers for my ipod. I actually travel with it so I can playing my relaxing ocean wave sounds CD in hotel rooms which helps me sleep. Its got the travel bag which works great and I usually just pack it safely in my suitcase. Beautiful sound that comes out of it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shetterly

customer_reviews.title: Speakers that do the job
customer_reviews.text: This JBL speaker dock replaces my other one that I used for my iphone 4. It works quite well with the iphone 5 with good but not great sound. It's portability was a major plus for me and the fact that it charges my phone as well. For the money this is a very good buy and I would recommend .
customer_reviews.author: ppdoc123

customer_reviews.title: Great for Work!
customer_reviews.text: Nice speaker! I bought it to use on my desk at work. It works with both my newer iPod Nano 7th generation and also my old iPod Touch 2nd gen. It's not really the kind of speaker that I would turn up at a party but for the lower volume needed to not bother coworkers it's great. Super simple to operate too. I have it plugged in but it also works on 4 AAA batteries (I haven't tried this yet).
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Mazzeo

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: This is ok. It works as expected, but it feels a bit cheap. I use it as a bedside charger for my phone at night, so it works great like that. Also, the speaker is good, not great. I had the one for the iPhone 4 and it seems to be built better and had better sound. These are minor apprehensions, otherwise, it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: AZfoodtogym

customer_reviews.title: Worth
customer_reviews.text: Its my favorite product to buy cause it was affordable
customer_reviews.author: Bluemann

customer_reviews.title: ... and don't need a remote etc these things are great, I have 2 of them
customer_reviews.text: If you just want a dock and don't need a remote etc these things are great, I have 2 of them. They charge my iPhone 5 faster than any other charger I have. They sound good, not stunning but good. I mostly use it for listening to Youtube videos etc.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D.

customer_reviews.title: works great. Love the sound
customer_reviews.text: works great. Love the sound, I have an old ipod so I had to buy the connector, however, it charges and this has been the best speaker for outdoor events.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Works with Iphone 6 Plus
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure if my iPhone 6 PLUS would work with this device, and it fits perfect with room to spare!
customer_reviews.author: MIKE MAC

product_meta.title: JBL OnBeat Micro Speaker Dock with Lightning Connector (Black) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
If you’ve got an iPhone 5, you’ve got to get the JBL OnBeat Micro. With the new Lightning dock connector built in, the JBL OnBeat Micro lets you enjoy your music without wires or adapters, and even has a USB port for compatibility with other devices. Compact and portable, the JBL OnBeat Micro can bring the noise from ceiling to floor for up to 5 hours when it’s using batteries and allows you to charge your docked device when it’s using AC power. The JBL OnBeat Micro is good to go whenever the rhythm hits you.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


VIEW LARGER 


ONBEAT MICRO

ENJOY MUSIC AT THE SPEED OF LIGHTNING.
The world’s first portable speaker dock equipped with a Lightning connector to deliver amazing audio from your iPhone 5, iPod touch or iPod nano.

• Access your music and dock and charge your iPhone 5 with a built-in Lightning connector

• Get ready for a room full of rhythm, thanks to two JBL® full-range transducers

• Take your music anywhere with AAA batteries or go non-stop at home with AC power



UPGRADE YOUR IPHONE 5 WITH JBL® SOUND.
If you’ve got an iPhone 5, you’ve got to get the JBL OnBeat Micro. With the new Lightning dock connector built in, the JBL OnBeat Micro lets you enjoy your music without wires or adapters, and even has a USB port for compatibility with other devices. Compact and portable, the JBL OnBeat Micro can bring the noise from ceiling to floor for up to 5 hours when it’s using batteries and allows you to charge your docked device when it’s using AC power. The JBL OnBeat Micro is good to go whenever the rhythm hits you.


ONBEAT MICRO AT A GLANCE: 
 * Built-in Lightning docking connector
 * JBL full-range transducers
 * Digital signal processing
 * Battery and AC power
 * USB port
 * 1/8-inch (3.5mm) stereo input
 * Compact and portable design
 * LED status indicator


VIEW LARGERGet live with the music on your iPhone 5 thanks to the JBL OnBeat Micro’s Lightning docking connector KEY FEATURES
BUILT-IN LIGHTNING DOCKING CONNECTOR
Get live with the music on your iPhone 5 thanks to the JBL OnBeat Micro’s Lightning docking connector. The connection is built in, so there’s no need for wires or adapters.

JBL FULL-RANGE TRANSDUCERS
Find a room and rock every bit of it. The JBL OnBeat Micro features not one but two JBL® full-range transducers to project incredibly dynamic sound that fills your surroundings.

DIGITAL SIGNAL PROCESSING
JBL speakers – even small ones – aren’t misers when it comes to delivering great sound. The JBL OnBeat Micro employs digital signal processing to generate big audio with great bass from a compact speaker. 

VIEW LARGEREnjoy easy access to great music with the JBL OnBeat Micro’s built-in USB port, which provides audio playback from other devices and also charges connected iPod and iPhone devices when you’re using AC power 

BATTERY AND AC POWER
You can power your own personal concert with the JBL OnBeat Micro for up to 5 hours using four AAA batteries or bounce to the beats non-stop using its included AC adapter.

USB PORT
Enjoy easy access to great music with the JBL OnBeat Micro’s built-in USB port, which provides audio playback from other devices and also charges connected iPod and iPhone devices when you’re using AC power. (Apple cable not included.)

1/8" (3.5MM) STEREO INPUT
The JBL OnBeat Micro’s 1/8-inch (3.5-millimeter) audio input conveniently allows you to connect to virtually any portable audio device and make it the centerpiece of the party. 

COMPACT AND PORTABLE DESIGN
Move the music whenever the mood strikes you, thanks to the JBL OnBeat Micro’s recessed connectors and lightweight, compact design. 

LED STATUS INDICATOR
For your convenience, the JBL OnBeat Micro’s clearly visible LED screen fills you in on its operating status.


PRODUCT SPECS
Specifications Transducers 2 JBL full-range transducers Power 2 x 2 watts Frequency response 110Hz – 20kHz Signal-to-noise ratio 73dB Input impedance (aux) 3k ohms Battery size/type 4 x AAA Power requirement 5.9V DC, 3.33A Power consumption 20W (maximum); 0.5W (standby) Dimensions (H x W x D) 2-1/4" x 6-5/8" x 6-5/8" (54mm x 168mm x 168mm) Weight 0.8 lbs (0.36kg) 



WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 * 1 JBL OnBeat Micro speaker dock
 * 1 AC adapter
 * Warranty card
 * Quick-start guide

DOCUMENTATION
Spec Sheet







HEAR THE TRUTH.
Even if you’ve never owned a JBL® product, you’ve almost certainly heard the JBL sound. It rings out loud and clear from the massive JBL loudspeaker arrays that hang in stadiums, sports arenas and concert venues everywhere. It literally surrounds you in more than 50 percent of all movie theatres worldwide, including many with THX® certification (a standard of realism that JBL engineering helped pioneer in 1983). Chances are, many of your favourite songs and movie soundtracks were mixed and mastered on JBL studio monitors – they’ve been the choice of audio professionals for more than 60 years. But you don’t have to venture far from home to experience the legendary power, clarity and technical accuracy of the JBL sound. It’s available in exceptional home entertainment systems that incorporate many of the same advanced technologies, materials and manufacturing techniques that we originally developed for professional systems. It’s even available in lightweight, portable packages that you and your friends can enjoy anywhere
feature_bullets: Fully digital signal path with digital signal processing
Battery and AC Power: Power Up to 5 hours using four AAA batteries, USB Port
